processingPreviousMessage: I'm processing your previous message, please wait... ⏳
sendingMessagesTooOften: You are sending messages too often. Please wait {{time}}... ⏳

errors.messageTooLong: You sent a message that is too long, please try shortening it.
errors.rateLimitReached: You are sending messages too often. Please wait a few seconds... ⏳
errors.modelOverloaded: Oh, I feel a bit dizzy... 😵 Too much workload. Give me a break... ⏳
errors.chatGPTError: Unknown ChatGPT error. Please try again.
errors.quotaExceeded: I have run out of resources to use ChatGPT. 😮 Please contact support for assistance: {{supportCommand}}
errors.unknownTelegramError: Unknown error while sending a message to Telegram.
errors.paymentError: An error occurred, the payment is unavailable at the moment. Sorry. 😢

waitOrBuy: Please wait or buy a product
newInvitee: 🔥 New user joined using your invite link!

promo.fanClub: You will get 🎁 a gift after joining our fan club: {{fanClubLink}}, where you always can ask questions and share ideas.
promo.premium: Buy product bundles {{premiumCommand}} to get more requests to {{gptDefaultModelName}} and get access to {{gptPremiumModelName}} and DALL-E.

welcome.hello: Hello, {{userName}}! 🤖 I am GPToid, a bot created to help you work with ChatGPT and DALL-E!
welcome.models: Here you can work with {{gptDefaultModelName}}, {{gptPremiumModelName}}, and DALL-E 3 models.
welcome.tutorial: If you are new to ChatGPT and DALL-E, our tutorial {{tutorialCommand}} would be a good starting point.
welcome.modes: I also have different modes of operation: {{modeCommand}}

gptoken.marketing: you want to work with {{gptPremiumModelName}} and DALL-E

description.intro: 🍥 Gptoken bundles to work with {{gptPremiumModelName}} and DALL-E

buyBundleIfNeeded: If {{marketingChunk}}, purchase one of the product bundles.

phoneInput.line2: It's needed for the automatic receipt sending.
phoneInput.line3: Press the "${{contactRequestLabel}}" button (Telegram will send it automatically).

incorrectPhoneNumberFormat: 📱 Incorrect phone number format. Please try again.
gotYourPhoneNumber: I've saved your phone number, thanks! 🙏
selectedProductUnavailable: The product you've selected is not available anymore.
productCantBePurchased: This product is not available for purchase anymore. Sorry. 😢

goToPayment.line1: 💳 Follow the link to make payment for {{productNameGen}}.
goToPayment.line2: ⚠ The link is temporary. If you don't make payment in time, you can get a new payment link using the {{premiumCommand}} command.
goToPayment.line3: We will notify you on receiving your payment.
